# prettysurvey

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of prettysurvey is to generate streamlined output from the `survey` package, with an application to NCHS.


## Installation

You can install the development version of prettysurvey like so:

``` r
install.packages(c("git2r", "remotes"))

# On local computer
remotes::install_git(
	url = "https://git.biotech.cdc.gov/kpr9/prettysurvey"
	, git = "git2r"
	, upgrade = "never")

# On EDAV RStudio
remotes::install_git(
	url = "https://git.biotech.cdc.gov/kpr9/prettysurvey"
	, upgrade = "never")

```

## Example

This is a basic example:

```{r}
library(prettysurvey)
set_survey("vars2019")
```

```{r, results='asis'}
tab("AGER")
```
